amendment.description: An amendment numbered 40 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to prohibit the use of funds to pay the salary and expenses of CISA Director of Election Security Initiative Geoffrey Hale.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 270 (Roll no. 447).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 270 (Roll no. 447).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
